Hero.subMessage: KGH GLOBAL realizes both a clean environment and prosperous agriculture through the perfect resource circulation of waste.

Process.title: Our Process
Process.subtitle: Innovative Rebirth of Waste Sludge
Process.description: Transform waste sludge into high-quality fertilizer through our 3-step process
Process.step1_description1: We use dried sludge from sewage treatment plants as the main raw material.
Process.step1_description2: Through innovative Thermal Hydrolysis Process (THP) technology, we improve sludge quality and completely eliminate odors and harmful substances.
Process.step1_detail_intro: Transform dried sludge from sewage plants into eco-friendly raw materials through innovative pretreatment technology.
Process.step1_detail_subtitle: Thermal Hydrolysis Process (THP) treats sludge in high-temperature, high-pressure environments.
Process.step1_detail_point1: Quality Enhancement: Maximize fertilizer value through organic decomposition
Process.step1_detail_point2: Odor Removal: Perfect odor control during treatment
Process.step1_detail_point3: Safety Assurance: Complete sterilization of pathogens and harmful substances
Process.step2_description1: At our fertilizer plant, we precisely blend organic matter and essential nutrients to create high-quality fertilizer.
Process.step2_description2: Through this process, simple sludge is reborn as a product optimized for crop growth.
Process.step2_detail_intro: Scientific nutrient blending at our fertilizer plant produces premium fertilizer optimized for crops and soil.
Process.step2_detail_point1: Organic Blending: Improve soil properties and enhance fertility
Process.step2_detail_point2: Nutrient Addition: Customized NPK input for export markets
Process.step2_detail_point3: Optimization: Transform into plant growth-optimized products
Process.step3_description1: We process into high-density pellet form for easy use and transport.
Process.step3_description2: Products are packaged using OEM (Original Equipment Manufacturer) method for our global partners, ready for export.
Process.step3_detail_intro: Finalize products to global standards and supply to world markets.
Process.step3_detail_point1: Pelletization: High-density pellets for storage, transport, and usage convenience
Process.step3_detail_point2: Global OEM: Quality assurance through Terramarine AS standard OEM production
Process.step3_detail_point3: Export Ready: Supply to Southeast Asian markets after systematic quality control

Partner.title: Our Global Partner
Partner.subtitle: Terramarine AS
Partner.description1: Headquartered in Norway, Terramarine AS is a specialized company in manufacturing and global sales of fertilizer based on organic waste.
Partner.description2: KGH GLOBAL serves as Terramarine AS's key production partner in Southeast Asia, sharing proven local distribution networks and fertilizer regulation expertise.
Partner.description3: Terramarine AS can accommodate all production volumes from our facility, enabling stable and continuous business operations.
